mapper.insert: insert into inventory_history (inventory_history_id, inventory_date, inventory_employee_code, inventory_employee_name, inventory_in_id, order_id, inventory_out_id, inventory_type, inventory_out_fee_check_status, inventory_history_settlement_status, inventory_history_code, inventory_history_in_out, gift_id, gift_return_id, inventory_move_id, inventory_history_remark ) values (#{inventory_history_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inventory_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory_in_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory_out_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory_out_fee_check_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory_history_settlement_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory_history_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inventory_history_in_out,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gift_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gift_return_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory_move_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inventory_history_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update inventory_history set inventory_date = #{inventory_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inventory_employee_code = #{inventory_employee_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_employee_name = #{inventory_employee_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_in_id = #{inventory_in_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_out_id = #{inventory_out_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_type = #{inventory_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_out_fee_check_status = #{inventory_out_fee_check_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_history_settlement_status = #{inventory_history_settlement_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_history_code = #{inventory_history_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_history_in_out = #{inventory_history_in_out,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_id = #{gift_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_return_id = #{gift_return_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_move_id = #{inventory_move_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inventory_history_remark = #{inventory_history_remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where inventory_history_id = #{inventory_history_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select inventory_history_id, inventory_date, inventory_employee_code, inventory_employee_name, inventory_in_id, order_id, inventory_out_id, inventory_type, inventory_out_fee_check_status, inventory_history_settlement_status, inventory_history_code, inventory_history_in_out, gift_id, gift_return_id, inventory_move_id, inventory_history_remark from inventory_history where inventory_history_id = #{inventory_history_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select inventory_history_id, inventory_date, inventory_employee_code, inventory_employee_name, inventory_in_id, order_id, inventory_out_id, inventory_type, inventory_out_fee_check_status, inventory_history_settlement_status, inventory_history_code, inventory_history_in_out, gift_id, gift_return_id, inventory_move_id, inventory_history_remark from inventory_history
